titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Conversational Club Collection, 1862 - [ongoing]

Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: The Conversational Club was formed in 1862 by the faculty of Wesleyan University to discuss topics of interest along with other Middletown residents.
The collection has four series: Minutes, Chronological Files, Addition of June 2008, and Addition of December 2009.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Conversational Club Collection, Collection #1000-30, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

acqinfo.head: Acquisitions Information
acqinfo.p: Given by club members prior to 1997 (Acc. 1000-20), Kay Briggs in 2000 (Acc. 2000-45), Karl Scheibe in 2008 (Acc. 2008-10), and John Shaw in 2009 (Acc. 2009-50).

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Lina Makdisi and Valerie Gillispie, February 2007
Additional materials processed and added to finding aid by Valerie Gillispie, June 2008, December 2009.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Conversational Club was formed in 1862 by the faculty of Wesleyan University to discuss topics of interest along with other Middletown residents. Meetings typically included dinner, a paper delivered by a club member, followed by discussion. Meetings rotated among the homes of the club members. Topics included world events, scientific and literary topics, philosophy, and anything else of general interest. The membership of the club was all male until 1987.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection has four series: Minutes, Chronological Files, Addition of June 2008, and Addition of December 2009. The Chronlogical Files include meeting notes, speeches, reply cards, bills, invitations, attendance lists, and other materials documenting club meetings. The Addition of June 2008 (Acc. 2008-10) includes program announcements, including members names and topics of discussion, from 1870 to 1963. It also includes some papers read at meetings, correspondence, meeting programs, financial information, and photographs. The materials have been arranged in roughly chronological order. The Addition of December 2009 (Acc. 2009-50) includes minutes and abstracts of meetings from January 2003 to May 2006.

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.

scopecontent.p: The materials in this series have been arranged roughly chronologically.
These were sent to members prior to each meeting. They list current members and the host, topic, and speaker for the upcoming meeting.
